resources.string: A quick look at what matters most this week.
Tick off the appointments and follow-ups you plan to cover soon.
No extra to-dos this week—keep following your provider’s guidance.
Small gestures to keep you connected and helpful today.
Check in and ask what kind of support would feel best right now.
We’ll send weekly nudges leading up to %1$s so you stay aligned with the pregnancy.
Due date %1$s is saved. Turn on weekly reminders in Settings to get gentle support prompts.
Add a due date in Settings to sync reminders with the pregnancy timeline you’re supporting.
This week’s focus: support week %1$d together.
Choose a due date to jump to the current week.
Get a gentle nudge to review the latest pregnancy insights each week.
Turn on notifications in system settings to receive weekly check-ins.
Manage your due date and reminders from Settings.
Set your due date to personalize weekly highlights.
Pick a palette that matches your journey. Gender reveal themes unlock once you reach the ultrasound window.
Add your due date to unlock gender reveal themes later in pregnancy.
Gender reveal themes unlock around week %1$d when many parents learn the baby’s sex.
Soft lavender and lilac that feel cozy before the big reveal.
Rosy highlights for celebrating traditionally feminine vibes.
Cool blues inspired by a classic gender reveal moment.
Reminders to open the app and view your current pregnancy week.
Open the app to explore the latest week-by-week guidance.
Visualize how baby’s size evolves each week.
Let us know how you’re connected so we can tailor tips.
I’m carrying the baby and want updates tailored to my experience.
I’m supporting the pregnant parent and want to stay in sync.
Use these cues to check in with her and offer support that feels right.
Share a quick peek now and explore the full update together later.
Baby keeps growing stronger and more active this week.
We’ll personalize your experience in three quick steps.
How are you connected to this pregnancy?
When is baby expected to arrive?
Pick a due date so we can jump straight to the right week.
Turn on weekly reminders so you never miss new highlights.
You can change this anytime in Settings.
